             <a href="/vpn-software/vpn-iot">
              Smart home devices
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
           <ul class="menu-group-list menu-group-browser-extensions">
            <li class="menu-group-title">
             Browser extensions
            </li>
            <li>
             <a href="/vpn-software/chrome-vpn">
              Chrome
             </a>
            </li>
            <li>
             <a href="/vpn-software/firefox-vpn">
              Firefox
             </a>
            </li>
            <li>
             <a href="/vpn-software/edge-vpn">
              Edge
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
           <ul class="menu-group-list menu-group-tools">
            <li class="menu-group-title">
             Tools
            </li>
            <li>
             <a href="/what-is-my-ip">
              What is my IP?
             </a>
            </li>
            <li>
             <a href="/dns-leak-test">
              DNS Leak Test
             </a>
            </li>
            <li>
             <a href="/webrtc-leak-test">
              WebRTC Leak Test
             </a>
            </li>
            <li>
             <a href="/password-generator">
              Password Generator
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </div>
         </li>
         <li class="menu-item submenu-support">
          <a class="menu-root-title" href="/support/" tabindex="0">
           Support
          </a>
         </li>
         <li class="menu-item submenu-blog">
          <a class="menu-root-title" href="/blog/" tabindex="0">
           Blog
          </a>
         </li>
         <li class="menu-item submenu-my-account">
          <a class="menu-root-title" href="/sign-in" tabindex="0">
           My Account
          </a>
         </li>
        </ul>
       </div>
      </li>
     </ul>
    </div>
   </nav>
  </header>

    <div class="container hero-content-wrapper">
     <div class="hero-text-block">
      <div class="column-heading">
       <h1 class="jumbo">
        The VPN that just works
       </h1>
      </div>
      <div class="column-subheading">
       <h4 id="go-further-with-the-1-trusted-leader-in-vpn">
        Go further with the #1 trusted leader in VPN
       </h4>
      </div>
      <div class="column-cta">
       <div class="button-group btn-center">
        <a class="btn primary with-arrow" href="/order" target="_self">
         Get ExpressVPN
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="column-footnote footnote paragraph-text">
       <p>
        30-day money-back guarantee
       </p>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="hero-img-block">
      <img alt="VPN user at a desk, browsing securely, unlocking content, and changing his location." loading="eager" src="https://ftr.imgix.net/3EOOAeQsNMQBJkX2HPZqJn/7b4c25bcca074a531f74bbda530f87df/homepage-pingzhu-hero-figures-v2-opt__1___3_.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=470&amp;dpr=1&amp;q=75&amp;s=1c815b0d04b19675bf75b56659439d84" srcset="https://ftr.imgix.net/3EOOAeQsNMQBJkX2HPZqJn/7b4c25bcca074a531f74bbda530f87df/homepage-pingzhu-hero-figures-v2-opt__1___3_.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=470&amp;dpr=1&amp;q=75&amp;s=1c815b0d04b19675bf75b56659439d84 1x,https://ftr.imgix.net/3EOOAeQsNMQBJkX2HPZqJn/7b4c25bcca074a531f74bbda530f87df/homepage-pingzhu-hero-figures-v2-opt__1___3_.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=940&amp;dpr=2&amp;q=75&amp;s=916579f4ed33cfa46a873b21185eddc0 2x,https://ftr.imgix.net/3EOOAeQsNMQBJkX2HPZqJn/7b4c25bcca074a531f74bbda530f87df/homepage-pingzhu-hero-figures-v2-opt__1___3_.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=1410&amp;dpr=3&amp;q=75&amp;s=341a220888c12741203e74b244128074 3x" width="470"/>

   <section class="block-group">
    <section class="two-col-content-m-block block-right fixed-width">
     <div class="container">
      <div class="row">
       <div class="column-image">
        <img alt="An opening in a brick wall that shows a sky with the sun and clouds, plus a cursor going towards the opening." class="img-block" loading="auto" src="https://ftr.imgix.net/11AcQtchrMiZrKGz4ZRirN/7e44386a57d14027cc0924743d9567c4/brickwall-peek-through-with-cursor-opt.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=480&amp;dpr=1&amp;q=75&amp;s=1bccf8224959cc1622cea9c5bb0b5644" srcset="https://ftr.imgix.net/11AcQtchrMiZrKGz4ZRirN/7e44386a57d14027cc0924743d9567c4/brickwall-peek-through-with-cursor-opt.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=480&amp;dpr=1&amp;q=75&amp;s=1bccf8224959cc1622cea9c5bb0b5644 1x,https://ftr.imgix.net/11AcQtchrMiZrKGz4ZRirN/7e44386a57d14027cc0924743d9567c4/brickwall-peek-through-with-cursor-opt.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=960&amp;dpr=2&amp;q=75&amp;s=93628073dfae17da5663d3e1c85a35a3 2x,https://ftr.imgix.net/11AcQtchrMiZrKGz4ZRirN/7e44386a57d14027cc0924743d9567c4/brickwall-peek-through-with-cursor-opt.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=1440&amp;dpr=3&amp;q=75&amp;s=d3980ae801c9f3a735b7869e3942e714 3x" width="480"/>
       </div>
       <div class="column-content">
        <div class="txt-left">
         <h2>
          The all-access pass to global content
         </h2>
        </div>
        <div class="subheading-text">
         <p>
          Get your favorite shows and apps wherever you are, and stay up to date even when you’re far from home. Say goodbye to censorship and restrictions.
         </p>
        </div>

           Get ExpressVPN

         </h2>

         </p>

          Phone, tablet, computer, router—no matter where you are or what devices you’re using, a single ExpressVPN subscription has got you covered.

        </div>
        <div class="feature-heading">
         <h3>
          Stronger data protection
         </h3>
        </div>
        <div class="feature-text">
         <p>
          Take charge of your online privacy and security with best-in-class encryption.
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="feature-image">
         <img alt="Be anywhere." loading="auto" src="https://ftr.imgix.net/5F2ySeLBognoZIJQNjyAot/71dd6fe83c1cc08ffa2dacde0759e39e/be-anywhere.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=440&amp;dpr=1&amp;q=75&amp;s=1adb7610593362ac316b22eb1795e87f" srcset="https://ftr.imgix.net/5F2ySeLBognoZIJQNjyAot/71dd6fe83c1cc08ffa2dacde0759e39e/be-anywhere.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=440&amp;dpr=1&amp;q=75&amp;s=1adb7610593362ac316b22eb1795e87f 1x,https://ftr.imgix.net/5F2ySeLBognoZIJQNjyAot/71dd6fe83c1cc08ffa2dacde0759e39e/be-anywhere.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=880&amp;dpr=2&amp;q=75&amp;s=16b212cf4304f37957f81bbb057d2c18 2x,https://ftr.imgix.net/5F2ySeLBognoZIJQNjyAot/71dd6fe83c1cc08ffa2dacde0759e39e/be-anywhere.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=1320&amp;dpr=3&amp;q=75&amp;s=051b2b5e12cd7dd8c8b65e77d8a7a9a4 3x" width="440"/>
        </div>
        <div class="feature-heading">
         <h3>
          Internet without borders
         </h3>
        </div>
        <div class="feature-text">
         <p>
          Access the content you love, anywhere in the world. Break through geoblocks.
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="feature-image">
         <img alt="Flaming speedometer with a secure lock." loading="auto" src="https://ftr.imgix.net/uoPgq1HAqZRS3jE7tdH0t/b4a797aa617cc7cbc03545217687fad9/blazing-fast-speeds.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=440&amp;dpr=1&amp;q=75&amp;s=e6ed1d2b7d394c18d62bf86aa3485697" srcset="https://ftr.imgix.net/uoPgq1HAqZRS3jE7tdH0t/b4a797aa617cc7cbc03545217687fad9/blazing-fast-speeds.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=440&amp;dpr=1&amp;q=75&amp;s=e6ed1d2b7d394c18d62bf86aa3485697 1x,https://ftr.imgix.net/uoPgq1HAqZRS3jE7tdH0t/b4a797aa617cc7cbc03545217687fad9/blazing-fast-speeds.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=880&amp;dpr=2&amp;q=75&amp;s=35c1935318c807cfae3c3774b5173e47 2x,https://ftr.imgix.net/uoPgq1HAqZRS3jE7tdH0t/b4a797aa617cc7cbc03545217687fad9/blazing-fast-speeds.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=1320&amp;dpr=3&amp;q=75&amp;s=24c2758f75f9497e1e4d9dc2f0a889a9 3x" width="440"/>
        </div>
        <div class="feature-heading">
         <h3>
          Lightning-fast connectivity
         </h3>
        </div>
        <div class="feature-text">
         <p>
          Our VPN network is built for speed, powered by next-generation technology.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>

   <div class="server-map-home">
    <div class="curve curve-top">
    </div>
    <div class="content">
     <div class="container">
      <h2 class="heading">
       High-speed servers worldwide
      </h2>
      <div class="map-content">

       <div class="stat">
        <div class="stat__item">
         <h1 class="amount">
          160
         </h1>
         <h3 class="name">
          locations
         </h3>
        </div>
        <div class="stat__item">
         <h1 class="amount">
          94
         </h1>
         <h3 class="name">
          countries
         </h3>
        </div>
        <div class="stat__item">
         <span class="xv-icon xv-icon-infinity">
          <svg height="24" viewbox="0 0 24 24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

           </path>
          </svg>
         </span>
         <h3 class="name">
          unlimited bandwidth
         </h3>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="textUnderMap">
       <a href="/vpn-server">
        See our full list of VPN server locations &gt;
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="curve curve-bottom">
    </div>
   </div>
   <section class="testimonials-home">
    <div class="container">
     <div class="two-column text-center">
      <h2>
       What people are saying about ExpressVPN
      </h2>
     </div>
    </div>

     <ul class="tab-list tab-block" role="tablist">

            <span class="xv-icon-twitter">
             <svg height="24" viewbox="0 0 24 24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
              <path d="M8.2896 20.2511752c7.5472.0 11.6752-6.252799999999999 11.6752-11.67519997C19.9648 8.39837523 19.9648 8.22157523 19.9528 8.04557523 20.7558651 7.46470391 21.4490844 6.74547874 22 5.92157523 21.2511032 6.25341664 20.4566634 6.47103814 19.6432 6.56717523 20.4997952 6.05436087 21.1408988 5.24779281 21.4472 4.29757523 20.641726 4.77553948 19.7605169 5.11238484 18.8416 5.29357523 17.5696662 3.94109065 15.5485755 3.61006529 13.9116394 4.48611917 12.2747034 5.36217304 11.42902 7.22743581 11.8488 9.03597523 8.54951659 8.87057485 5.47558062 7.31223384 3.392 4.74877523 2.30289821 6.62369101 2.85919031 9.02226281 4.6624 10.2263752 4.00939296 10.2070213 3.3706235 10.0308658 2.8 9.71277523 2.8 9.72957523 2.8 9.74717523 2.8 9.76477523 2.80053451 11.7180496 4.17740119 13.4004034 6.092 13.7871752 5.48789568 13.9519273 4.85406447 13.9760107 4.2392 13.8575752 4.77675834 15.5291135 6.31725965 16.6742023 8.0728 16.7071752 6.61978803 17.8491208 4.82484761 18.4690374 2.9768 18.4671752 2.65032286 18.4665485 2.32416325 18.4467812 2 18.4079752 3.87650876 19.6121965 6.05993072 20.2509488 8.2896 20.2479752" fill="#1b1d22" fill-rule="evenodd">
              </path>
             </svg>
            </span>
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="cards-col tweets">
         <div class="home-card">
          <div class="home-card-avatar">
           <img alt="Jon Narong" loading="lazy" src="https://ftr.imgix.net/7KvOAq3AMPtj6N4Nru1AgH/2aa88c0c39c5132a4591b8615c2637ad/JonNarong.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=80&amp;dpr=1&amp;q=75&amp;s=31ece1efba5868d352b9a067730936ff" srcset="https://ftr.imgix.net/7KvOAq3AMPtj6N4Nru1AgH/2aa88c0c39c5132a4591b8615c2637ad/JonNarong.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=80&amp;dpr=1&amp;q=75&amp;s=31ece1efba5868d352b9a067730936ff 1x,https://ftr.imgix.net/7KvOAq3AMPtj6N4Nru1AgH/2aa88c0c39c5132a4591b8615c2637ad/JonNarong.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=160&amp;dpr=2&amp;q=75&amp;s=03cde0b99e92cb248367dcabd42512db 2x,https://ftr.imgix.net/7KvOAq3AMPtj6N4Nru1AgH/2aa88c0c39c5132a4591b8615c2637ad/JonNarong.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=240&amp;dpr=3&amp;q=75&amp;s=8a540ae7ede60375bdd7604c70eb8cbe 3x" width="80"/>

          </div>

   </section>
   <section class="chat-and-mbg-home-block">
    <div class="container">
     <div class="row">
      <div class="column">
       <div class="grid-item">
        <div class="grid-item-top-content">
         <div class="grid-item-img">
          <img alt="24-hour support" class="img-block" loading="lazy" src="https://ftr.imgix.net/5vtGHt7FfNFaahUXC9v1C5/9f772cc812726808eeb288fc3cc2144c/home-24-hour-support.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=370&amp;dpr=1&amp;q=75&amp;s=554c8692a70e712a01af94224ea7afd5" srcset="https://ftr.imgix.net/5vtGHt7FfNFaahUXC9v1C5/9f772cc812726808eeb288fc3cc2144c/home-24-hour-support.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=370&amp;dpr=1&amp;q=75&amp;s=554c8692a70e712a01af94224ea7afd5 1x,https://ftr.imgix.net/5vtGHt7FfNFaahUXC9v1C5/9f772cc812726808eeb288fc3cc2144c/home-24-hour-support.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=740&amp;dpr=2&amp;q=75&amp;s=ad5c00dedffdfda68b29563879f70f27 2x,https://ftr.imgix.net/5vtGHt7FfNFaahUXC9v1C5/9f772cc812726808eeb288fc3cc2144c/home-24-hour-support.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=1110&amp;dpr=3&amp;q=75&amp;s=1cd8a2d668b4e29be517b359bf0fbf12 3x" width="370"/>
         </div>
         <h3 class="grid-item-heading">
          Live, 24-hour customer support
         </h3>
         <p class="grid-item-text">
          Real support from real people. We’re available through instant live chat and email to help you set up and troubleshoot.
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="grid-item-cta">
         <a class="btn secondary" href="/support/">
          Contact Support
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="column">
       <div class="grid-item">
        <div class="grid-item-top-content">
         <div class="grid-item-img">
          <img alt="30 days money back guarantee" class="img-block" loading="lazy" src="https://ftr.imgix.net/2W2x9qsd1l0T7GbOMxJt3m/466df18d330d5b75cb718395e82a1da7/home-30-days-money-back-guarantee.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=370&amp;dpr=1&amp;q=75&amp;s=fc33b906ea30d553c4a17cf173e90d78" srcset="https://ftr.imgix.net/2W2x9qsd1l0T7GbOMxJt3m/466df18d330d5b75cb718395e82a1da7/home-30-days-money-back-guarantee.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=370&amp;dpr=1&amp;q=75&amp;s=fc33b906ea30d553c4a17cf173e90d78 1x,https://ftr.imgix.net/2W2x9qsd1l0T7GbOMxJt3m/466df18d330d5b75cb718395e82a1da7/home-30-days-money-back-guarantee.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=740&amp;dpr=2&amp;q=75&amp;s=154793a7caf6ee8ef049c8ae93e3bcca 2x,https://ftr.imgix.net/2W2x9qsd1l0T7GbOMxJt3m/466df18d330d5b75cb718395e82a1da7/home-30-days-money-back-guarantee.png?auto=format,compress&amp;cs=srgb&amp;fit=max&amp;w=1110&amp;dpr=3&amp;q=75&amp;s=7d1bb0aa0e7499621a8c063b4df88329 3x" width="370"/>
         </div>
         <h3 class="grid-item-heading">
          30-day money-back guarantee
         </h3>
         <p class="grid-item-text">
          Our VPN is easy to use. So is our guarantee. If you’re not satisfied, we’ll refund your payment. No hassle, no risk.
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="grid-item-cta">
         <a class="btn primary" href="/order">
          Get ExpressVPN
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </section>
  </div>
